org.exist.xquery
Class ModuleContext

java.lang.Object
  org.exist.xquery.XQueryContext
      org.exist.xquery.ModuleContext

public class ModuleContext
extends XQueryContext

Subclass of XQueryContext for imported modules.

Author:
wolf
